New Records: Manny Machado homered twice to tie Nate Colbert for San Diego's career record with 163
Key Match Events: Machado had a solo shot in the first
Machado matched Colbert's record with an impressive drive into the second deck in left field leading off the eighth
Machado's shot to left off rookie Mason Black gave the Padres a 3-0 lead after just four batters
Machado added an RBI single in the fifth
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Mike Shildt called Machado's second shot 'a big boy home run'
Shildt said tying the franchise record is 'a big deal'
Machado's shot to left off rookie Mason Black gave the Padres a 3-0 lead after just four batters
Winning pitcher Michael King said Machado changes games and it's showing
Miscellaneous Highlights: Machado's 25th shot of the season gave him 42 multi-homer games since his rookie year of 2012
Machado has 338 homers in his 13-year career
CF Jackson Merrill left the game with a bruised left patella suffered on a foul ball in the sixth
